text: 731 Lexington Avenue also known as Bloomberg Tower is a skyscraper in New York City, United States. It is 246 meters (806 feet) tall. It has 54 floors. It was built in 2005 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world * List of tallest buildings in New York City == Other websites == * Emporis.com – Bloomberg Tower * SkycraperPage.com – Bloomberg Tower Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:2005 establishments in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan Category:Michael Bloomberg
title: 731 Lexington Avenue
